FuncDef:
The inclusive-provider-tunnel command creates and displays the EVI I-PMSI view.
The undo inclusive-provider-tunnel command deletes the EVI I-PMSI view and configurations in the view.
By default, the EVI I-PMSI view is not created.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
On a network where an EVPN carries multicast services, to reduce redundant traffic and conserve bandwidth resources, configure EVPN to use an mLDP P2MP tunnel for service transmission. Configurations required for this function must be performed in the EVI I-PMSI view. To create and enter the EVI I-PMSI view, run the inclusive-provider-tunnel command.
